item.title: You become admin, if you understand this
item.dc:creator: @SeySayux SeySayux
item.description:
@SeySayux wrote:

first, learn english. if you already know english, good english, please, check your post for errors before you hit the post button. next, i don’t understand a single thing of what you want.

if i understood you well, you ment

When i try to run my server, it says "cannot find process.java". Can anyone help please?

if this is correct, you have the kind of server i don’t understand. first there is no thing like process.java, because you’ll have to run process.class. next in all servers i know (which are testscape, cheezscape, project 16, pimpscape, SeoScape I v1 and v2, SeoScape Pk) does have such a class

Read full topic

item.source: You become admin, if you understand this

item.title: You become admin, if you understand this
item.dc:creator: @Brad_c Brad_c
item.description:
@Brad_c wrote:

@echo off cls :menu title X-Scape Compiler + Run echo Please choose an option below to do that function. echo Please dont brake the rules on moparisthebest.com/smf echo. echo c - Compile your server. echo r - To run your server. echo e - To exit out of the program. echo. echo. set /p compile=Option: if %compile%==c goto compile if %compile%==C goto compile if %compile%==r goto run if %compile%==R goto run if %compile%==e goto end if %compile%==E goto end if %compile#==* goto error goto error :compile cls title X-Scape Compiler if defined javac (goto compile2) else (goto checkjavac) :compile2 if exist *.java (goto compile3) else (goto compileerror) :compile3 %javac% -cp . *.java pause cls goto menu :compileerror cls echo You need to have Java files for this compiler to compile. pause cls goto menu :run cls title Run X-scape if exist .\server.class (goto run2) else (goto servererror) :run2 set java=java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar cls goto run3 :run3 %java% server pause cls goto menu :servererror cls title Error echo You do not have a Server.class. Make sure that you have used the echo compiler with your server BEFORE you try running it. pause cls goto menu :error cls title Error echo Invalid command. Please make sure the commands you type echo in are correct. pause cls goto menu :end cls exit :checkjavac if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac) else (goto checkjavac2) :checkjavac2 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac2) else (goto checkjavac3) :checkjavac3 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac3) else (goto checkjavac4) :checkjavac4 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac4) else (goto checkjavac5) :checkjavac5 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac5) else (goto checkjavac6) :checkjavac6 if exist "%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" (goto setjavac6) else (goto javacerror) :setjavac set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac2 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac3 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_08\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac4 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :setjavac5 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 set javac="%programfiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" goto compile2 :javacerror cls title Error echo You do not have JDK 5.0 Update 6-10 or JDK 6.0. Go to Mod Taharok's tutorial echo on the Moparscape Tuturoials section for a direct link to download echo the newest JDK Update. pause cls goto menu

Use that, it compiles and runs, happy?

Read full topic

@Brad_c wrote:

Thats not what he meant

Translation - i think.

First I had class, now I have a pause on the end, but now its not dissapearing but it says “Could not process Java”

What should I do.

And hes saying if anyone helps they can be an admin on his server.
